name: Last Robot
description:
Join the battle against evil scientists and escape their scheme to experiment on you!

Last Robot is a 2D top down shooter made for the AET Game Jam Summer 2021.

Contributors:

Ivorii: Programming, Art, UI

PVdude: Programming, UI

AdamGA: Music and Sound

Azailix: Art, UI, Sprites

Doreen: Art, Sprites
